trans-unit.source: Keyword Reference

seg-source.mrk: Keyword Reference

target.mrk: Keyword Reference

trans-unit.source: The WINDOWPLACEMENT structure contains information about the placement of a window on the screen

seg-source.mrk: The WINDOWPLACEMENT structure contains information about the placement of a window on the screen

target.mrk: The WINDOWPLACEMENT structure contains information about the placement of a window on the screen

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Specifies the length, in bytes, of the structure

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the length, in bytes, of the structure

target.mrk: Specifies the length, in bytes, of the structure

trans-unit.source: Specifies flags that control the position of the minimized window and the method by which the window is restored. This member can be one or more of the following values

seg-source.mrk: Specifies flags that control the position of the minimized window and the method by which the window is restored.
This member can be one or more of the following values

target.mrk: Specifies flags that control the position of the minimized window and the method by which the window is restored.
This member can be one or more of the following values

trans-unit.source: $WPF_ASYNCWINDOWPLACEMENT - If the calling thread and the thread that owns the window are attached to different input queues, the system posts the request to the thread that owns the window.

seg-source.mrk: $WPF_ASYNCWINDOWPLACEMENT - If the calling thread and the thread that owns the window are attached to different input queues, the system posts the request to the thread that owns the window.

target.mrk: $WPF_ASYNCWINDOWPLACEMENT - If the calling thread and the thread that owns the window are attached to different input queues, the system posts the request to the thread that owns the window.

trans-unit.source: $WPF_RESTORETOMAXIMIZED - Specifies that the restored window will be maximized, regardless of whether it was maximized before it was minimized.

seg-source.mrk: $WPF_RESTORETOMAXIMIZED - Specifies that the restored window will be maximized, regardless of whether it was maximized before it was minimized.

target.mrk: $WPF_RESTORETOMAXIMIZED - Specifies that the restored window will be maximized, regardless of whether it was maximized before it was minimized.

trans-unit.source: This setting is only valid the next time the window is restored. It does not change the default restoration behavior.

seg-source.mrk: This setting is only valid the next time the window is restored.
It does not change the default restoration behavior.

target.mrk: This setting is only valid the next time the window is restored.
It does not change the default restoration behavior.

trans-unit.source: This flag is only valid when the @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED value is specified for the showCmd member.

seg-source.mrk: This flag is only valid when the @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED value is specified for the showCmd member.

target.mrk: This flag is only valid when the @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED value is specified for the showCmd member.

trans-unit.source: $WPF_SETMINPOSITION - Specifies that the coordinates of the minimized window may be specified.

seg-source.mrk: $WPF_SETMINPOSITION - Specifies that the coordinates of the minimized window may be specified.

target.mrk: $WPF_SETMINPOSITION - Specifies that the coordinates of the minimized window may be specified.

trans-unit.source: This flag must be specified if the coordinates are set in the ptMinPosition member.

seg-source.mrk: This flag must be specified if the coordinates are set in the ptMinPosition member.

target.mrk: This flag must be specified if the coordinates are set in the ptMinPosition member.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the current show state of the window. This member can be one of the following values:

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the current show state of the window.
This member can be one of the following values:

target.mrk: Specifies the current show state of the window.
This member can be one of the following values:

trans-unit.source: @SW_HIDE - Hides the window and activates another window.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_HIDE - Hides the window and activates another window.

target.mrk: @SW_HIDE - Hides the window and activates another window.

trans-unit.source: @SW_MAXIMIZE - Maximizes the specified window.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_MAXIMIZE - Maximizes the specified window.

target.mrk: @SW_MAXIMIZE - Maximizes the specified window.

trans-unit.source: @SW_MINIMIZE - Minimizes the specified window and activates the next top-level window in the z-order.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_MINIMIZE - Minimizes the specified window and activates the next top-level window in the z-order.

target.mrk: @SW_MINIMIZE - Minimizes the specified window and activates the next top-level window in the z-order.

trans-unit.source: @SW_RESTORE - Activates and displays the window. If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_RESTORE - Activates and displays the window.
If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position.

target.mrk: @SW_RESTORE - Activates and displays the window.
If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position.

trans-unit.source: An application should specify this flag when restoring a minimized window.

seg-source.mrk: An application should specify this flag when restoring a minimized window.

target.mrk: An application should specify this flag when restoring a minimized window.

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOW - Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOW - Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position.

target.mrk: @SW_SHOW - Activates the window and displays it in its current size and position.

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a maximized window.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a maximized window.

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWMAXIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a maximized window.

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a minimized window.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a minimized window.

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED - Activates the window and displays it as a minimized window.

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE - Displays the window as a minimized window.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE - Displays the window as a minimized window.

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWMINNOACTIVE - Displays the window as a minimized window.

trans-unit.source: This value is similar to @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED, except the window is not activated.

seg-source.mrk: This value is similar to @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED, except the window is not activated.

target.mrk: This value is similar to @SW_SHOWMINIMIZED, except the window is not activated.

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWNA - Displays the window in its current size and position.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWNA - Displays the window in its current size and position.

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWNA - Displays the window in its current size and position.

trans-unit.source: This value is similar to @SW_SHOW, except the window is not activated.

seg-source.mrk: This value is similar to @SW_SHOW, except the window is not activated.

target.mrk: This value is similar to @SW_SHOW, except the window is not activated.

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWNOACTIVATE - Displays a window in its most recent size and position.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWNOACTIVATE - Displays a window in its most recent size and position.

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWNOACTIVATE - Displays a window in its most recent size and position.

trans-unit.source: This value is similar to @SW_SHOWNORMAL, except the window is not activated.

seg-source.mrk: This value is similar to @SW_SHOWNORMAL, except the window is not activated.

target.mrk: This value is similar to @SW_SHOWNORMAL, except the window is not activated.

trans-unit.source: @SW_SHOWNORMAL - Activates and displays a window.

seg-source.mrk: @SW_SHOWNORMAL - Activates and displays a window.

target.mrk: @SW_SHOWNORMAL - Activates and displays a window.

trans-unit.source: If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position.

seg-source.mrk: If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position.

target.mrk: If the window is minimized or maximized, the system restores it to its original size and position.

trans-unit.source: An application should specify this flag when displaying the window for the first time.

seg-source.mrk: An application should specify this flag when displaying the window for the first time.

target.mrk: An application should specify this flag when displaying the window for the first time.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the coordinates of the window's upper-left corner when the window is minimized.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the coordinates of the window's upper-left corner when the window is minimized.

target.mrk: Specifies the coordinates of the window's upper-left corner when the window is minimized.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the coordinates of the window's upper-left corner when the window is maximized.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the coordinates of the window's upper-left corner when the window is maximized.

target.mrk: Specifies the coordinates of the window's upper-left corner when the window is maximized.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the window's coordinates when the window is in the restored position.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the window's coordinates when the window is in the restored position.

target.mrk: Specifies the window's coordinates when the window is in the restored position.
